Package com.aep.model

Class CourseDTO

java.lang.Object
com.aep.model.CourseDTO
public class CourseDTO extends Object
CourseDTO represents a course offered by an institution in the system. It serves as a Data Transfer Object for the Course table.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private BigDecimal
    compensation
    The compensation offered for teaching the course.

    The preferred qualifications for teaching the course.
    private String
    schedule
    The schedule for the course (e.g., days and times it is held).
    private String
    term
    The academic term in which the course is offered (e.g., Fall, Winter).
